plays.text: Penalty to Ray Whitney 2 minutes for Holding Jiri Slegr

Penalty to Jean-Luc Grand-Pierre 2 minutes for Holding Tomas Holmstrom
Penalty to Steve Duchesne 2 minutes for Interference Jody Shelley
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Brendan Shanahan and Nicklas Lidstrom
